name: Toys Pop
description:
Have you ever wished to live in a land full of toys? MadOverGames grants you this wish and welcomes you to a colorful new bubble shooter - Toys Pop!

With the help of your bubble shooting skills, simply match three or more bubbles and help Gugoo & his friends bring peace to toys kingdom. This journey is not going to be easy though, as BugeyMan will do whatever it takes to stop you. But don't worry, with your slick bubble shooting moves, he won't stand a chance.

With over 2000 levels filled with toys and bursting bubbles, your journey is not going to end anytime soon. If you are not a solo traveler, connect to Facebook and let your friends be a part of this bubble shooting adventure!

Toys Pop features:

-- Easy to play - just match three or​ more bubbles to pop them
-- Shoot all the bubbles and free cute little Teddies from BugeyMan's trap
-- Play in funky locations like Kitchen, Bedroom, Backyard and more
-- Over 4 characters to choose from
-- Connect to Facebook to save your game progress & play with friends
-- Bomb, lightning, and more powerups to help you win
-- Play daily and win lots of free rewards
-- 2000 free levels with more added every month


Available in English, français, Deutsche, italiano, Español, Português, русский, Tiếng Việt, bahasa Indonesia, عربى, ไทย, čeština, 简体中文, 中國傳統的, 한국어, 日本語, Türk, Nederlands, dansk, svenska, norsk, Suomalainen
